Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Explosion after explosion threatens to deafen everyone on the field.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Zachery has seen such explosions in the past. Old records show that people used to level abandoned buildings with explosives.'}
{3: 'But that is too inelegant for a mechanical engineer like him. The construction mech he designed would be able to safely demolish even the most robust high-rise.'}
{3: 'He never thought he would witness the demolishing of his own design.'}
{3: 'Neither was he sure if his mechanoid could be taken down by explosives.'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier Pietro', 3: 'This is the rescue team reporting! All personnel have been evacuated from the camp!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory31.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier Leon', 3: 'This is the distraction team! We can see the Corrupted Colossus taking damage!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Good work!', 4: '11'}
{3: 'Watanabe puts away his dagger and concludes their battle with encouragement on the radio.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "The target has sustained heavy injury and nearly stopped moving and attacking, but we haven't exhausted its battery yet. Close-quarter attacks can be lethal to us.", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'All units retreat on my command—', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Soldier Leon', 3: '—Hold on! Boss!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier Leon', 3: "The target is moving away from our estimated route! It's moving toward its two o'clock direction—fast approaching the rescue route!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: '...Rescue team! Report!', 4: '11'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier Pietro', 3: "This is the rescue team. We've finished evacuating the camp! We're making sure there's no one remaining...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier Pietro', 3: '...There is still one person left in the camp!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Soldier Pietro', 3: 'Requesting support! Is there anyone near the rescue route?!', 4: '1'}
{1: '2', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory20.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: "This is Suma from the demolition team! I'm near the route! I'm heading there to rescue—", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Bzzzz—bzzzz—'}
{2: 'Soldier Pietro', 3: "Suma! Answer! The target is approaching your direction—what's your status?!"}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "Cough—cough—you don't have to warn me, captain obvious...!", 4: '1'}
{3: "There is a brief silence, followed by loud clashes through the radio that almost cover up Suma's desperate voice."}

{2: 'Suma', 3: "This is Suma! I'm inside the attack range of the Corrupted Colossus, and I'm impacted by the impact! Calling for Zachery from the engineering team! The target Corrupted is deviating from its path! I need guidance!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Zachery! Zachery! Do you hear me?! We talked about what to do if this happens! Do it!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Hello? Anyone?! This is Suma! Zachery?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Dammit! Is the radio getting interference—', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "This is Watanabe! I hear you, Suma. Your radio is working. I've just arrived where Zachery is.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We're dispatching reinforcement to draw the attention of the Corrupted Colossus.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'And Zachery...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Watanabe looks down. Holding the blueprint in his hands, Zachery stares at the colossus in the distance, sweating.'}
{3: 'His hands are shaking, and his blueprint falls to the ground.'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "What's wrong with him?! This is a critical moment—cough! Cough!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Hey! Hello?! This is Suma, calling for Zachery...!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Suma's furious shouts and coughs and the colossus' heavy footsteps blend together in Zachery's earpiece, sounding less and less real."}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory28.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Stop daydreaming and start explaining the blueprint! The boss is still waiting for us to come up with a plan.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After a brief daze, Zachery concentrates and collects himself. Suma has already laid out several blueprints on the floor.'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "Ah, yes. I'm here. We can start.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'How much do you know about the capability and mechanism of explosives?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Boss has gone through some fundamentals with me, so I know the basics...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "Good. Take a look at my drafts, and I'll look at yours. Let's confirm how many bombs we'll need.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Oh, alright. Sure.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Blueprints of another trade are not easy to understand, but standardized plans share a similar lexicon. The two of them quickly find a way in and begin their reviews.'}
{3: "But Zachery's attention soon turns away from the blueprint before him toward Suma."}
{3: 'Hesitating briefly, Zachery finally speaks.'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "I-I just want to say that I didn't go to Babylonia because...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "There was someone who looked after you for a long time, and they weren't qualified to go to Babylonia despite you did, so you chose to stay on the surface. Am I right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Suma does not even turn to look at him.'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Eh... um... H-how did you know...?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Suma', 3: "People who could go to Babylonia but didn't were either deceived or had something they couldn't leave behind. Getting an IV solution from the boss means you have someone that requires chronic care.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Given how mousy you are, I bet it was an elder brother or sister that kept you here.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Right, right. You guessed it. It was my brother... He had been looking after me since I was a kid, heh...', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Zachery', 3: "Babylonia's policy was very strict. I was offered a ticket for my level of expertise, but it was for me and me only. Where could I possibly go by myself, right...? But at least... I could stay behind for him.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'He never abandoned me... He always shared the food he got with me. Hehe, heh...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'U-until the day when... w-when my brother...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "When he got hurt and couldn't take care of you anymore?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Yeah... yeah.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'It... was a concussion. He was rescued in time, but there were complications. He can still walk around, but his mind...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "I assumed so. Who doesn't have someone like that if they stayed after the Great Evacuation?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'S-so, you too...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "Worse than you. They're all gone now.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "My grandparents went first. Old people, y'know? Pretty much screwed once the serums stopped coming.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Then it was my younger sister. Slow runner, she. Caught by the Corrupted.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "And the rest... I don't know if they were lucky or not. All of them were crushed to their deaths at the same time. It was quick.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Oh, right. You designed that mechanoid.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'The IUSL construction mech.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Oh, oh. I-is that so...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Zachery pretends not to hear Suma and fiddles with the map in his hands while facing away.'}
{3: 'Unscrolling the map on the ground, he sees one of the corners rolling back and grabs some sand and rock to weigh it down, only for another corner to roll up.'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "...What are you doing? What's the point of fighting with the map?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zachery keeps repeating this action for a few minutes.'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "I-it's nothing. I just want the map to lie flat so it's easier for us to see...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Any more bullshit? Can you look at me when you speak?', 4: '1'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{3: 'Before he knows it, Zachery is spun around, and Suma grabs him by his collar.'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "What's with that expression? Just speak your mind already. What's the point of holding back?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He mumbles for a while before saying something comprehensible.'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'D-do you blame me...? For creating something like that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "No. I don't blame anyone. I just blame myself.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'I blame myself... for being alive.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'I-I see. Heh...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: '—Aaah! Ouch...', 4: '2'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Suma lets go of Zachery before he can laugh, and he falls on his buttocks.'}
{1: 'PanelActor2Shake'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "Stop being so sentimental! I was indulging in your therapy session only because you were taking your time to sulk! Now you're getting me all schmaltzy!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Just tell me where to blow up. Boss is still waiting for us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "I don't care how you feel about your robot. It's threatening all of us right now. Their survival depends on us destroying that mechanoid.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Suma', 3: "That's right—their survival! You've decided to stay. Do you want to watch your brother die? I don't know if Boss or Leon cares to live another day, but if you want to take care of your brother, take care of this first.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Zachery', 3: "Okay, okay! Fine, fine, fine. Just take a look at page three of the blueprint and get an understanding of its structure. I'll elaborate on them after I take a look at your demolition plan...", 4: '2'}
{3: "Suma throws a blueprint into Zachery's arms before turning around and grabbing one of Zachery's to study."}
{3: 'And she misses Zachery muttering as he reads the composition of the explosion.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Zachery', 3: 'How I feel... Sigh... Why would I feel anything about it...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'My brother... was hurt by that mechanoid, after all...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'No one wants to destroy this thing more than me... No one...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'No one... no one...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'He wanted to destroy it sooner. He could have destroyed it sooner.'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "But... why couldn't I do it...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zachery remembers the last time this machine was infected.'}
{3: 'He thought he had done his best and turned off the mechanoid\'s power and scanning function, but he did not expect the machine was still operating... and carrying out its "mission."'}
{3: 'That was one of his designs. The mechanoid can draw power from other sources so that it has backup power to continue its operation when it loses its main power supply.'}
{3: 'He even remembers how he gloated to his colleagues when he proposed this design.'}
{3: 'He also remembers clearly how he risked his life to shut down the mechanoid last time, only for it to survive with its power reserve—and crush a dozen of his companions with its feet.'}
{3: 'He also remembered how he told the others everything about these designs.'}
{3: 'But he still has not worked out... how much energy a motionless mechanoid has gathered buried underneath the heated sand.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Zachery! Wake up!', 4: '1'}
{3: "Slap! Distracted, Zachery finds Watanabe's face before him—as well as Watanabe's two hands."}

{3: "Zachery's face is once again sandwiched between Watanabe's hands. The scars on Watanabe from the battle with the Corrupted Colossus smell like rust, and his palms feel rough on Zachery's cheeks."}
{3: 'But Zachery cannot feel any pain this time.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Zachery, you also looked like this the last time you saw the Corrupted Colossus.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Watanabe's tone is so low that he is almost inaudible against the noise the Corrupted Colossus makes."}
{3: 'Zachery, however, can hear his words clearly, as if they are pierced into his mind.'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're scared. You're sorry. You're thinking about what happened last time and how you failed.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You're right. That thing is terrifying. We're all afraid. You're its maker—you're also afraid that you're responsible for every life it hurts and takes.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'But you have to remember that this is not your fault. Without the Punishing Virus, the machine would have been your pride.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Yes, you, Zachery—an engineering genius of tomorrow. I've heard the people from Cosmos Industries mention your name. That was something you were proud of.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'And now, you have another chance to achieve something you can be proud of—save our teammates and both of our camps.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'You might have failed in the past and missed the chance to save someone you cared about, but what you have now is another opportunity and us. You still have a chance to protect that person... and all of us.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'This can be your pride.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Zachery bends down and crouches, the cold sweat on his forehead dripping onto the sand.'}
{3: 'Then he shakes his head and picks up the blueprint he dropped on the ground.'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: "Right... I won't waste this chance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Zachery', 3: 'Engineering team! This is Zachery. I need you to coordinate with the demolition team to execute an emergency rescue mission!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory26.jpg'}

{3: 'Despite the numerous hits to its core, the heavy colossus is still slowly advancing. Every small step it makes raises a storm of stones, dispersing the soldiers that are attacking and drawing its attention.'}
{3: 'Behind the colossus, Suma crawls slowly underneath a shower of stone.'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'This is Suma reporting! The distraction is working. The Corrupted Colossus is being drawn back to our planned route for now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "I've arrived at the camp to rescue the remaining person!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: '—What are you staying here for? Get going! No one has time for your crap!', 4: '1'}

{3: "Suma crosses a large field to tear away a tent damaged in the colossus' path, revealing a shivering young man underneath. She tries to pull him away, but his body seems to have taken root, not moving an inch."}
{3: 'He keeps his eyes on the Colossus Corrupted that is treading nearby and watches his old camp crumble to pieces.'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "You're the lieutenant from Humanity Corp, aren't you? What is so precious here that you can't look away?!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lieutenant', 3: 'Everything I have... the photos I took with my family, the trinkets my brothers gave me... all of them... were destroyed by that thing...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lieutenant', 3: "They're all gone now. I'm the only one left... What else do I even live for...? I'd rather just...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The lieutenant stares at the approaching colossus, his gaze misty.'}
{3: 'Suma lets go of his arms, allowing them to fall to his sides.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: "Yeah, isn't it nice? Get it over with, and you get to see your family again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "Although no one here is gonna remember your family if you're gone.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Suma', 3: "You told me you loved the beach and the parks, and your family worked multiple jobs to afford a trip to Venus Splash Park on your birthday. You hadn't forgotten the Shark-speare you saw, the photos your family took, and the new years you spent together...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "There won't be anyone to remember any of that if you're gone.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Will you pay that price to die alone?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The lieutenant is silent. Eventually, he raises his trembling arms again.'}
{3: "This time, he holds Suma's hands."}
{2: 'Suma', 3: 'Now, get up and run! The big guy is going to squash us!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory5.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: 'This is Suma! Personnel rescued! Where should we go?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Copy! A rescue vehicle is coming for you in your three o'clock direction. Another vehicle on distraction duty is coming from your nine o'clock! Get out of there ASAP!", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "Get out of here...? We're too late!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Suma', 3: "We're too close to the detonation location. The Corrupted will trigger the bomb!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Suma', 3: 'Tch. Desperate times. The big one is coming. Hold on, kid.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lieutenant', 3: 'The what?!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Before the lieutenant understands what is happening, Suma has already pushed his head into the sand before hunkering down herself.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Right then, a massive shockwave hits them from behind, pressing them deep into the desert sand.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab', 2: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxTongyong/FxUiMemoryInformation.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory428.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiBegin.prefab'}
{3: 'The explosion feels like it has buried the whole world. When the dust settles, there is nothing but silence.'}
